author: rwaldhoff
msg: Removing several deprecated and redundent method.
To set credentials, username, password, etc., use getState().setXXX instead, which saves us the trouble of having to mirror all of the State methods in HttpClient.

author: rwaldhoff
msg: * have writeRequestBody return boolean, removing the need for "used" depedency between HttpMethodBase and subclasses
* javadoc and reorder HttpMethod and HttpMethodBase methods

author: rwaldhoff
msg: removing needExpectation method, moving expection responsibilities down to PutMethod
